Exception class

　Exception class is a class for generating Exception object.
　The syntax of the constructor is as follows.

new Exception (<message>)
　The message is set in the message property of the generated object.
　In addition, the trace property records information such as the functions that passed before the exception occurred (recorded as a human-readable string).
　All exception objects generated by factors other than script are objects of the Exception class (for example, a division error exception).

　In the future, more properties may be available.

message

　The message property is a property that represents a string that describes the reason for the exception.
